sections.title: Structure

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The requirement is not applicable here, as R13 is contingent on the presence of an infobox, which is missing in this section.
A top section in the article should include one or more appropriate infoboxes.

sections.meta_notes: The section lacks infoboxes necessary to summarize key facts about the proteins discussed, which affects adherence to multiple infobox-related requirements.
